name: Food Fight (itch) (sudarshanseshadri26)
description:
Is a hotdog a sandwich? Is cereal soup? Is water wet? Does pineapple go on pizza? Dive into a world of petty conflict in Food Fight! Pick a side, argue with your friends, then battle it out to defeat the most enemies to be able to determine who is right!

Work together - or don't! Petty conflict will take you all the way to victory.
